title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI/API; includes Go server, built-in model library, and Docker image.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; async/sync wrappers, streaming chat, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; supports chat, generate, pull, delete, streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat threads, model management, RAG uploads, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit; ingest docs and chat locally.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI for Ollama with REPL, syntax highlighting, conversation saving and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code completer.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialised Ollama Modelfile tuned for chemistry Q&A and SMILES generation; includes training notes.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Bot wrapper that exposes Ollama models through Telegram; supports group chats, streaming, auth list.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starter, fluent API, and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async/await, native JSON streaming, and nimble package.

title: ollama-models-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles (CodeLlama-70B-Instruct, SQLCoder, Zephyr…) with benchmarks.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Electron desktop client for Ollama with system tray, local markdown notebook, and dark theme.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 SDK-style client for Ollama supporting IAsyncEnumerable streaming, dependency injection, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI commands: summarize note, rewrite, generate flashcards.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building local RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot with slash commands, thread-based chats, and per-user model preferences via Ollama.
